Talk_1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>The day is young. Who knows? If I hurry,
maybe I'll have something ready for the
evening edition!
Talk_1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>The night is young. Who knows? If I hurry,
maybe I'll have something ready before
we go to print!
Talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>As for you, partner... Why not rest at the
inn till daybreak? Don't want to be stuck
outside with the late-night monster crowd.
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Partner, you're here! I should've known
you'd come to this stable too.

Anyone with a beak for sniffing out news
can tell this place has potential.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>A <clr:0000>god of horses<clr:ffff>? Suspicious events at the
<clr:0000>nearby laboratory<clr:ffff>?

We could ink a week's worth of issues
about the goings-on in this place alone.<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Sad_01>But I have bad news, and the headline is
"No Leads on Princess at This Stable."<sp:5:0:0>

No chirps. No warbles. Nothing. Pains
me to leave knowing how many articles
I could've hatched here.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>There's nothing to do but take wing and
head for another stable.
Talk_1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>As for you, partner... Why not go dry out
at the inn? You're looking pretty soaked.
